GDP Settings
Series Selection Save Picture Select New File File URL Provide a URL to new EPWT file Select option(s) for display on line graph Default packaged file for graph Untick for locally processed file Select locally processed file
Permission is required in order to write graph to external storage. Request Storage Permission? Yes No
EPWT Graph was a summer project developed by Catherine Mackie as part of the requirements for completion of a MSc in Information Technology at the University of Glasgow. The project was supervised by Dr Paul Cockshott. \n\nThe purpose of this app is to make line graphs displaying Marxian data from the Extended Penn World Tables. The default file is EPWT v4.csv, and the application has the ability to process a new EPWT file in CSV format in the Settings page. About
